# Tests of `gridpts`

## default (N(0,1))

approximate variance of standard normal (i.e., 1)
```{r}
x1 <- gridpts_()
x2 <- gridpts()
```

```{r}
tibble(diff_z = sum(abs(x1$z - x2$z)),
       diff_w = sum(abs(x1$w - x2$w)))
```

## approximate probability above .95 quantile (i.e., .05)
```{r}
x1 <- gridpts(a = qnorm(.95), b = Inf) 
x2 <- gridpts_(a = qnorm(.95), b = Inf) 
```

```{r}
tibble(diff_z = sum(abs(x1$z - x2$z)),
       diff_w = sum(abs(x1$w - x2$w)))
```
